Sentencas: Nickel-Yttria-stabilized zirconia (Ni-YSZ) cermet (ceramic-metal composite) anodes have been prepared from a simple electroless Ni bath without hypophosphite.
Titulo: Development of Ni-YSZ cermet anode for solid oxide fuel cells by electroless Ni coating

Sentencas: Ni-YSZ powder having varying amounts of Ni has been prepared.
Titulo: Development of Ni-YSZ cermet anode for solid oxide fuel cells by electroless Ni coating

Sentencas: The effect of two different reducing agents has been evaluated with respect to stability of the bath.
Titulo: Development of Ni-YSZ cermet anode for solid oxide fuel cells by electroless Ni coating

Sentencas: Hydrazine can be effectively used as a reducing agent up to 30 vol.% Ni.
Titulo: Development of Ni-YSZ cermet anode for solid oxide fuel cells by electroless Ni coating

Sentencas: However beyond 30% Ni, the hydrazine bath loses its stability.
Titulo: Development of Ni-YSZ cermet anode for solid oxide fuel cells by electroless Ni coating

Sentencas: Formaldehyde is found to be a very effective reducing agent for higher Ni concentration.
Titulo: Development of Ni-YSZ cermet anode for solid oxide fuel cells by electroless Ni coating

Sentencas: The Ni-YSZ powder obtained is characterized by SEM and XRD.
Titulo: Development of Ni-YSZ cermet anode for solid oxide fuel cells by electroless Ni coating

Sentencas: When the powder is oxidized for calculating actual amount of Ni deposited, it turns to complete green due to the formation of NiO.
Titulo: Development of Ni-YSZ cermet anode for solid oxide fuel cells by electroless Ni coating

Sentencas: The XRD results also show distinct peaks of NiO.
Titulo: Development of Ni-YSZ cermet anode for solid oxide fuel cells by electroless Ni coating

Sentencas: The powder is pressed and sintered in air and reduced in hydrogen atmosphere to convert NiO back to Ni.
Titulo: Development of Ni-YSZ cermet anode for solid oxide fuel cells by electroless Ni coating

Sentencas: The sintered microstructure shows a well-defined network of Ni around YSZ particles and the fracture surface shows porosity.
Titulo: Development of Ni-YSZ cermet anode for solid oxide fuel cells by electroless Ni coating

Sentencas: These features indicate the effectiveness of the technique in producing the essential microstructural elements necessary for effective functioning of the anode.
Titulo: Development of Ni-YSZ cermet anode for solid oxide fuel cells by electroless Ni coating
